title: In Move From Web To TV, 'Childrens Hospital' Could Set An Example
teaser: Childrens Hospital returns to Cartoon Network's Adult Swim for its sixth season Friday. NPR's Eric Deggans spent a day on set and reports on how this niche comedy is swimming against the tide.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
